name: 施勝雄
objective:
先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。
一階，二階，及高階常微分方程式,拉普拉氏轉換，向量幾何與分析,矩陣行列式等,包含原理,解題及應用。
schedule:
週次	講授內容概要	                           教科書章節
1	Separable Eqs. Linear Differential Eqs	1.1,1.2,13
2	Exact Differential Eqs, Integrating Factors	1.4,1.5
3	Homogeneous, Bernoulli Eqs 	1.6,
4	Electrical Circuits,Vibration.Orthogonal traj	1.7
5	2nd Order Diff. Eqs: Theory of Solutions,	2.1,2.2
6	Reduction of Order,	2.3
7	Const.Coeff.HomogeneousLinear Eqs,Euler Eqs	2.4,
2.5
8	The Nonhomogeneous Equation,applications	2.6,2.7
9	期中考及檢討
10	Definit. and Properties of Laplace Transform	3.1
11	Solution of I.V.P. , Shifting Theorems	3.2, 3.3
12	Unit step fn.,2nd Shifting Theorems	3.3
13	Convolution ,Unit Impulses, Dirac Delta Fn.	3.4, 3.5
14	Laplace Transform Solution of Systems	3.6
15	Vectors & Vector Space	              6.1,6.2,6.3,6.4,6.5
16	Matrix,Elementary row operation	     7.1,7.2,7.3,7.4,7.5
17	Systems of Linear Equations, Matrix Inverse	7.6, 7.7, 7.8
18	期末考
scorePolicy: 平時成績30%, 期中考30%, 期末考40%.
